QuestionTxt: I'm going to read you a list of specific elements or parts of the law. For each, please tell me whether you think it is something the law does, or not. To the best of your knowledge, would you say the (2010) health reform law does or does not...require nearly all Americans to have health insurance or else pay a fine?
StudyNote: 600 respondents were interviewed on a landline telephone, and 903 were interviewed on a cell phone, including 498 who had no landline telephone.

RespTxt: No, law does not do this
